verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> an apostle, <S%G652><s%> (not of men, <S%G444><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> by man, <S%G444><s%> but by Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and God <S%G2316><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> raised <S%G1453><s%> him from the dead; <S%G3498><s%>)
And all <S%G3956><s%> the brothers <S%G80><s%> which are with me, to the churches <S%G1577><s%> of Galatia: <S%G1053><s%>
Grace <S%G5485><s%> be to you and peace <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and from our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

Who <S%G3588><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> for our sins, <S%G266><s%> that he might deliver <S%G1807><s%> us from this <S%G3588><s%> present <S%G1764><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and our Father: <S%G3962><s%>
To whom <S%G3739><s%> be glory <S%G1391><s%> for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

I marvel <S%G2296><s%> that you are so <S%G3779><s%> soon <S%G5030><s%> removed <S%G3346><s%> from him that called <S%G2564><s%> you into <S%G1722><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> to another <S%G2087><s%> gospel: <S%G2098><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> is not another; <S%G243><s%> but there be some <S%G5100><s%> that trouble <S%G5015><s%> you, and would <S%G2309><s%> pervert <S%G3344><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

But though <S%G1437><s%> we, or <S%G2228><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> preach <S%G2097><s%> any other gospel <S%G2097><s%> to you than <S%G3844><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> we have preached <S%G2097><s%> to you, let him be accursed. <S%G331><s%>

As we said <S%G4280><s%> before, <S%G4280><s%> so <S%G2532><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> I now <S%G737><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> man preach <S%G2097><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> other gospel <S%G2097><s%> to you than <S%G3844><s%> that you have received, <S%G3880><s%> let him be accursed. <S%G331><s%>

For do I now <S%G737><s%> persuade <S%G3982><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> God? <S%G2316><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> do I seek <S%G2212><s%> to please <S%G700><s%> men? <S%G444><s%> for if <S%G1487><s%> I yet <S%G2089><s%> pleased <S%G700><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> I should not be the servant <S%G1401><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
But I certify <S%G1107><s%> you, brothers, <S%G80><s%> that the gospel <S%G2098><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was preached <S%G2097><s%> of me is not after <S%G2596><s%> man. <S%G444><s%>

For I neither <S%G3761><s%> received <S%G3880><s%> it of man, <S%G444><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> was I taught <S%G1321><s%> it, but by the revelation <S%G602><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

For you have heard <S%G191><s%> of my conversation <S%G391><s%> in time <S%G4218><s%> past in the Jews' <S%G2454><s%> religion, <S%G2454><s%> how that beyond <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5236><s%> measure <S%G5236><s%> I persecuted <S%G1377><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and wasted <S%G4199><s%> it:

And profited <S%G4298><s%> in the Jews' <S%G2454><s%> religion <S%G2454><s%> above <S%G5228><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> my equals <S%G4915><s%> in my <S%G3450><s%> own nation, <S%G1085><s%> being <S%G5225><s%> more <S%G4056><s%> exceedingly <S%G4056><s%> zealous <S%G2207><s%> of the traditions <S%G3862><s%> of my fathers. <S%G3967><s%>

But when <S%G3753><s%> it pleased <S%G2106><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> separated <S%G873><s%> me from my mother's <S%G3384><s%> womb, <S%G2836><s%> and called <S%G2564><s%> me by his grace, <S%G5485><s%>

To reveal <S%G601><s%> his Son <S%G5207><s%> in me, that I might preach <S%G2097><s%> him among <S%G1722><s%> the heathen; <S%G1484><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> I conferred <S%G4323><s%> not with flesh <S%G4561><s%> and blood: <S%G129><s%>

Neither <S%G3761><s%> went <S%G424><s%> I up to Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> to them which were apostles <S%G652><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> me; but I went <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Arabia, <S%G688><s%> and returned <S%G5290><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to Damascus. <S%G1154><s%>

Then <S%G1899><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> I went <S%G424><s%> up to Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> to see <S%G2477><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and stayed <S%G1961><s%> with him fifteen <S%G1178><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>
But other <S%G2087><s%> of the apostles <S%G652><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> I none, <S%G3756><s%> save <S%G1508><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> the Lord's <S%G2962><s%> brother. <S%G80><s%>
Now <S%G2236><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> I write <S%G1125><s%> to you, behold, <S%G2400><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> I lie <S%G5574><s%> not.
Afterwards <S%G1899><s%> I came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the regions <S%G2824><s%> of Syria <S%G4947><s%> and Cilicia; <S%G2791><s%>
And was unknown <S%G50><s%> by face <S%G4383><s%> to the churches <S%G1577><s%> of Judaea <S%G2449><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were in Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

But they had heard <S%G191><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> That he which persecuted <S%G1377><s%> us in times <S%G4218><s%> past now <S%G3568><s%> preaches <S%G2097><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> once <S%G4218><s%> he destroyed. <S%G4199><s%>
And they glorified <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in me.
